songs.title: Wherever I Go
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Here we are now
Everything's about to change
We face tomorrow
As we say goodbye to yesterday
A chapter ending
But the story's only just begun
A page is turning for everyone

[Chorus]
So, I’m moving on, letting go
Holding onto tomorrow
Oh, I’ve always got the memories
While I’m finding out who I’m gonna be
We might be apart
But I hope you always know
You’ll be with me
Wherever I go
Wherever I go

[Verse 2]
So excited
I can barely even catch my breath
We have each other
To lean on for the road ahead
This happy ending
Is the start of all our dreams
And I know your heart is with me

[Chorus]
So, I’m moving on, letting go
Holding onto tomorrow
Oh, I’ve always got the memories
While I’m finding out who I’m gonna be
We might be apart
But I hope you always know
You’ll be with me
Wherever I go

[Bridge]
It's time to show the world
We’ve got something to say
A song to sing out loud
We’ll never fade away
I know I’ll miss you
But we’ll meet again someday
We’ll never fade away

[Chorus]
So, I’m moving on, letting go
Holding onto tomorrow
Oh, I’ve always got the memories
While I’m finding out who I’m gonna be
We might be apart
But I hope you always know
You’ll be with me... (Wherever I go)

[Chorus]
So, I’m moving on, letting go
Holding onto tomorrow (Wherever I go)
Oh, I’ve always got the memories
While I’m finding out who I’m gonna be
We might be apart
But I hope you always know
You’ll be with me, yeah
Wherever I go

[Outro]
Wherever I
Wherever I go
